function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Airborne transmission of viruses in indoor environments","Surface-touch contamination as a mode of virus transmission","Increased risk of contagious diseases through close proximity and shared facilities","Spread of contagious diseases in indoor office environments","Inadequate ventilation and air quality leading to the accumulation of airborne contaminants and pathogens","Inadequate ventilation and cooling capacity during extreme events leading to body heat overload and heat-related illnesses","Over-reliance on indoor cooling systems leading to increased electricity consumption, energy demand, and greenhouse gas emissions during heat waves","Sandstorms leading to degraded air quality, respiratory problems, heart stress, and eye infections","Virus transmission through surfaces and human-building interactions","Risk of increased infection through contact with commonly touched surfaces during occupant health assessments , survey instruments","Buildings as a vector for contagious diseases transmission","Potential spread of contagious diseases through contact with shared biomarker measurement devices , thermal cameras, sensors","Disinfection and killing mechanisms of sars-cov-2 on various surfaces","Survival of the virus on different surfaces for extended periods","Air filtration systems with graphene for virus killing","Corrosive nature and residue left by popular disinfectants sodium hypochlorite and hypochlorous acid","Breakthrough infections despite vaccine launch","Economic impact of infectious diseases","Influence of environmental conditions and surface temperature on virus activity"]}
